WelcomePage.title: Welcome to Salary Radar
WelcomePage.text: To get started, you need to
WelcomePage.firstContent: At Salary Radar, we provide you with up-to-date and reliable data on industry salaries so you can make better career decisions.
WelcomePage.secondContent: Salary transparency is key to better career planning. Join us and discover how the market is moving in your industry.

Dashboard.title: Know your market value with Salary Radar
Dashboard.subtitle: Discover key insights about salaries in your industry to make more informed decisions. Compare salaries based on your position, experience, and other personalized filters to better understand your standing in the job market.
Dashboard.moreInfo: Our registration process is quick and simple. We only need a few details to provide you with the best experience.
